Hi {!Account.Primary_Contact_First_Name__c}!
It’s a pleasure to welcome you to Luxury Presence! We can’t wait to begin collaborating on your brand and digital strategy.
I’m also pleased to introduce you to [Social Media Service Owner], your dedicated social media strategist. [Social Media Service Owner] will reach out shortly to schedule a call to discuss your goals and start shaping a powerful social media plan tailored to your needs.
As a thank you for partnering up with Luxury Presence, I wanted to let you know about our lucrative referral program. If you refer LP to another agent who signs up with us, you will receive a $1,200 credit applied to your account. Link to referral form --> Click here!
If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to your Social Media Manager. Welcome to the team!
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName}
